title: Slope-Intercept Form
text: The slope-intercept form of an equation of a line with slope $$m$$ and y-intercept, (0,b), is $$y=mx+b$$.
speech: The slope-intercept form of an equation of a line with slope  m  and y-intercept, (0,b), is  y, is equal to, m x plus b .
pacedSpeech: The slope-intercept form of an equation of a line with slope   m
and y-intercept, (0,b), is   y, is equal to, m x plus b

title: Rewritten Form
speech: The rewritten equation is  y is equal to, negative 4 thirds times x, plus 1 .
pacedSpeech: The rewritten equation is   y is equal to, negative 4 thirds times x, plus 1
